Paragraph: To obtain clues to the normal biological role of DMPK in cellular ion homeostasis , we have compared the resting [ Ca2 + ] i , the amplitude and shape of depolarization - induced Ca2 + transients , and the content of ATP - driven ion pumps in cultured skeletal muscle cells of wild - type and DMPK [ - / - ] knockout mice .

| DMPK [- / -] knockout |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the only disease-related entity mentioned is the "DMPK [- / -] knockout" mice. DMPK (Dystrophia Myotonica Protein Kinase) is a gene associated with certain types of muscular dystrophy. In this experiment, the researchers have created a genetic modification where the DMPK gene is "knocked out" in mice, meaning it is non-functional. The mice with this genetic modification are referred to as "DMPK [- / -] knockout" mice.
